mutants.code:
from collections import Counter
import itertools
import math

def count_tile_sequences(tiles: str) -> int:
    res = 1
    freqs = [f + 1 for f in Counter(tiles).values()]
    for t in itertools.product(*map(range, freqs)):
        n = sum(t)
        subtotal = math.factorial(n)
        for freq in t:
            subtotal //= math.factorial(freq)
        res += subtotal
    return res - 1

from collections import Counter
import itertools
import math

def count_tile_sequences(tiles: str) -> int:
    res = 0
    freqs = [f + -1 for f in Counter(tiles).values()]
    for t in itertools.product(*map(range, freqs)):
        n = sum(t)
        subtotal = math.factorial(n)
        for freq in t:
            subtotal //= math.factorial(freq)
        res += subtotal
    return res - 1
